title: Cosmos DB Data Explorer
vision: An Azure Cosmos DB data explorer page that lets users browse databases, containers, and documents with inline JSON editing, query execution, and real-time throughput metrics.
problem: Developers need to quickly inspect and modify Cosmos DB documents without switching to the full Data Explorer app. A lightweight embedded explorer reduces context-switching and speeds up debugging workflows.
successCriteria: Database and container tree navigation in a left sidebar
Document list with sortable columns (id, partition key, timestamp)
Inline JSON viewer/editor for selected documents
Query bar with execute button and results table
Throughput/RU usage sparkline chart in the header
nonGoals: No real Cosmos DB API integration â€” mock data only
No stored procedures or triggers management
constraints: Mock data for all documents and metrics
